title: NBA Refs See Mistakes, But Can't Fix Them, With Instant Replay
teaser: Instant replay allows referees to look back at what happened, but not to call fouls retroactively. NPR's Lynn Neary talks to Slate.com's Mike Pesca about how the replay has affected the NBA playoffs.
